VCDataCenterManager Class Reference
[Data Source Configurator Plugins]

Management object for direct control of Sessions and Data Center connections. More...

(BOOL) - sendConfigurationInfo:forSession:
 Send a dictionary of configuration data to a session.

Static Public Member Functions

(VCDataCenterManager *) + defaultManager

Detailed Description

The Data Center manage provides primarily internal functionality for VisualCommander's management of sessions and data centers. However, parts of its API are exposed for use by Data Source Configurators.

Member Function Documentation

+ (VCDataCenterManager *) defaultManager

Returns the default (singleton) data center manager.
